column1: Kata Robata////The quality of ingredients and care in the execution is what sets Kata Robata apart from the rest. This was the Sashimi Bento box lunch special with sashimi slices
column3: seaweed salad and California roll. I opted out of the chicken serving and asked for more agadashi tofu-- which is well executed and delicate with each bite. Who knew clean eating can be so yummy.
